title: of that section as they relate to the State body to which the following order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Veterinary Council of 
Ireland) (Designation) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (veterinary council ireland) (designation) order 2021

title: of that section as they relate to the State body to which the following order
heading: 2. The Veterinary Council of Ireland is designated for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. The Veterinary Council of Ireland is designated for the purposes of 
section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 February, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [58] 3
text_norm: 2 veterinary council ireland designated purpose section 29 civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (no 13 2020) given official seal 10 february 2021 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 12th february 2021 58 3

title: of that section as they relate to the State body to which the following order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order designates the Veterinary Council of Ireland for the purposes of 
holding remote meetings in accordance with Section 29 of the Civil Law and 
Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [58]
